title: Is Mordekaiser good
body: Ok I’ve been playing ALOT of Mordekaiser recently in top and it works really well but I was curious if he’s a good over all champ and feel free t explain your answer

replies.body: My build is a spirit vissage for health and healing and a bloodthirter so if my W is on cooldown I can use the Q for not only MASSIVE DAMAGE THAT NOT EVEN FLEX TAPE CAN FIX but a bunch of healing as well. Then a Liandrys and a Morello for more damage.

Well, he's not Ezreal so he's not the best.

 http://www.auplod.com/u/pdolua802d6.png
We get the point your a taric fan boy along with ezreal

I can't say if he is good or not but I do enjoy playing him quite a bit.  Haven't liked Ryalis very much since it was adjusted a while back so I've been using Frozen Heart in its place for now.
from my own experience... You build AP right? too squishy for team fights... and not much damage compared to others when splitting... i feel like ok he can do well in skirmishes but thats it... lol
My build is ryalis Crystal Scepter and liandrys and then I get deadmans plate then trinity force and if I want to be a terrible person warmogs or rabadons
